      • add

        public void add​(Project project)
        This method adds a project internally and in the file structure. This includes creating the files/data structure that are needed for storing a project such that it can be reloaded after closing the application.
        Specified by:
        add in interface FileHandlerInterface
        Parameters:
        project - the project to be added

      • delete

        This method deletes the project internally and in the file structure.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface FileHandlerInterface
        Parameters:
        project - the project to be deleted

        Parameters:

        title - the title of the project

      • change

        public void change​(Project project,
                   java.lang.String oldTitle)
        This method makes changes in the given project.
        Specified by:
        change in interface FileHandlerInterface
        Parameters:
        project - the project to be changed with the changed values inside
        oldTitle - the old title of the project

      • read

        public void read​()
        This method gets all existing projects for initializing them after starting the application.
        Specified by:

      • readFile

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readFile​(java.io.File file)
        This method is used internally for reading Strings from a file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be read from
        Returns:
        the content of the file as a String ArrayList

      • writeToFile

        This method is used internally for saving a String to a file.
